description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts that provide additional information to the universal service identifier on why a test, study or review was ordered. Initial values are to support the IHE LCC LAB-7 transaction.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0951 (Reason for Study)

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license.html

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

definition.value: Requests that the specimen should be stored long term
Requests verification of previously reported results

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

display.value: Store residual specimen pending follow up

definition.value: Requests that the specimen should be saved for a short duration until follow up is completed
Requests interpretation of previously reported results

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

definition.value: Requests comparison of previously reported results amongst themselves

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

definition.value: For process improvement work this code can be used to identify when an incorrect test was performed for the target order

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

definition.value: For process improvement work this code can be used to identify orders and the respective results, where problems occurred during ordering

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

definition.value: For process improvement work this code can be used to identify when a patient identification issue has occurred on the target order

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

definition.value: Requests verification of previously reported results due to suspected interference

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

definition.value: For process improvement work this code can be used to identify orders, where problems occurred during sample collection

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

definition.value: For process improvement work this code can be used to identify orders, where problems occurred during sample transport

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

definition.value: For process improvement work this code can be used to identify results with excessive reporting delay

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested

definition.value: For process improvement work this code can be used to identify when incorrect result were reported for the target order

valueString.value: Used to indicate why review is requested
